title: Starting SEO as your Home Based Business
description: This is a comprehensive course designed to teach you everything you need to know about SEO. From keyword research to advanced link-building strategies, this course covers it all.
whatYouLearn: Master on-page and off-page SEO techniques
Learn to use tools like Google Analytics and Search Console
Develop a complete SEO strategy for your business

instructorDetails.name: Edward Norton
instructorDetails.title: Design Expert
instructorDetails.bio: Edward Norton is a senior web developer with over 10 years of experience in the industry. He has worked on numerous projects ranging from small business websites to large-scale web applications.
